record.title: ANNOUNCING THE BIRTH OF EVELYN ROSE NUNES
record.narrative:
ANNOUNCING THE BIRTH OF EVELYN ROSE NUNES -- (House of Representatives - December 06, 2007)

[Page: H14270]
(Mr. DREIER asked and was given permission to address the House for 1 minute.)

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I am very pleased to announce to the House that our distinguished colleague Devin Nunesthe proud parents of 6 pound, 13 ounce Evelyn Rose Nunes, who was born at 3:31 yesterday morning. I think all of us want to extend hardy congratulations to them. I am happy to report that mother and baby are doing very well.
